text: Tower type (induced draft, forced draft, open-loop, closed-loop) matches schedule and capacity

Tower base installed level with clearance for service and airflow
Condenser water lines connected with flexible couplings, balancing valve, strainers, chemical injection ports
Vibration isolators and seismic restraints (if required) installed properly

Water level controller installed and tested (float, ultrasonic, or conductivity)
BAS/DDC integrated with status, fan speeds, basin heater, alarm, and trend points
Flow rates balanced and pressure drop verified across tower
Motor rotation and speed control tested; fan vibration within limits
Basin filled and checked for leaks, overflow, and proper drainage
Water treatment system activated and commissioned
Start-up report and warranty registration submitted by manufacturer rep
